text: @aortenzi @ChrisJZullo @realDonaldTrump Fair enough, but the topic was China's response in January 2020 when they isolated the coronavirus genome. My addition to the conversation was the Chinese GOV'T knew about the disease at least by November and THEN, nothing. WHOM are you saying is to blame for COVID-19 !??!??

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
